title: Google\Cloud\Dataflow\V1beta3\FlexTemplateRuntimeEnvironment
name: FlexTemplateRuntimeEnvironment
description:
The environment values to be set at runtime for flex template.

Generated from protobuf message google.dataflow.v1beta3.FlexTemplateRuntimeEnvironment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.num_workers
params.description: The initial number of Google Compute Engine instances for the job.

params.name: data.max_workers
params.description: The maximum number of Google Compute Engine instances to be made available to your pipeline during execution, from 1 to 1000.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: The Compute Engine availability zone for launching worker instances to run your pipeline. In the future, worker_zone will take precedence.

params.name: data.service_account_email
params.description: The email address of the service account to run the job as.

params.name: data.temp_location
params.description: The Cloud Storage path to use for temporary files. Must be a valid Cloud Storage URL, beginning with gs://.

params.name: data.machine_type
params.description: The machine type to use for the job. Defaults to the value from the template if not specified.

params.name: data.additional_experiments
params.description: Additional experiment flags for the job.

params.name: data.network
params.description: Network to which VMs will be assigned. If empty or unspecified, the service will use the network "default".

params.name: data.subnetwork
params.description: Subnetwork to which VMs will be assigned, if desired. You can specify a subnetwork using either a complete URL or an abbreviated path. Expected to be of the form "https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/HOST_PROJECT_ID/regions/REGION/subnetworks/SUBNETWORK" or "regions/REGION/subnetworks/SUBNETWORK". If the subnetwork is located in a Shared VPC network, you must use the complete URL.

params.name: data.additional_user_labels
params.description: Additional user labels to be specified for the job. Keys and values must follow the restrictions specified in the labeling restrictions page. An object containing a list of "key": value pairs. Example: { "name": "wrench", "mass": "1kg", "count": "3" }.

params.name: data.kms_key_name
params.description: Name for the Cloud KMS key for the job. Key format is: projects//locations//keyRings//cryptoKeys/

params.name: data.ip_configuration
params.description: Configuration for VM IPs.

params.name: data.worker_region
params.description: The Compute Engine region (https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/regions-zones) in which worker processing should occur, e.g. "us-west1". Mutually exclusive with worker_zone. If neither worker_region nor worker_zone is specified, default to the control plane's region.

params.name: data.worker_zone
params.description: The Compute Engine zone (https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/regions-zones) in which worker processing should occur, e.g. "us-west1-a". Mutually exclusive with worker_region. If neither worker_region nor worker_zone is specified, a zone in the control plane's region is chosen based on available capacity. If both worker_zone and zone are set, worker_zone takes precedence.

params.name: data.enable_streaming_engine
params.description: Whether to enable Streaming Engine for the job.

params.name: data.flexrs_goal
params.description: Set FlexRS goal for the job. https://cloud.google.com/dataflow/docs/guides/flexrs

params.name: data.staging_location
params.description: The Cloud Storage path for staging local files. Must be a valid Cloud Storage URL, beginning with gs://.

params.name: data.sdk_container_image
params.description: Docker registry location of container image to use for the 'worker harness. Default is the container for the version of the SDK. Note this field is only valid for portable pipelines.

params.name: data.disk_size_gb
params.description: Worker disk size, in gigabytes.

params.name: data.autoscaling_algorithm
params.description: The algorithm to use for autoscaling

params.name: data.dump_heap_on_oom
params.description: If true, save a heap dump before killing a thread or process which is GC thrashing or out of memory. The location of the heap file will either be echoed back to the user, or the user will be given the opportunity to download the heap file.

params.name: data.save_heap_dumps_to_gcs_path
params.description: Cloud Storage bucket (directory) to upload heap dumps to the given location. Enabling this implies that heap dumps should be generated on OOM (dump_heap_on_oom is set to true).

params.name: data.launcher_machine_type
params.description: The machine type to use for launching the job. The default is n1-standard-1.

methods.name: getDumpHeapOnOom
methods.description:
If true, save a heap dump before killing a thread or process which is GC thrashing or out of memory. The location of the heap file will either be echoed back to the user, or the user will be given the opportunity to download the heap file.

Generated from protobuf field bool dump_heap_on_oom = 22;

methods.name: setDumpHeapOnOom
methods.description:
If true, save a heap dump before killing a thread or process which is GC thrashing or out of memory. The location of the heap file will either be echoed back to the user, or the user will be given the opportunity to download the heap file.

Generated from protobuf field bool dump_heap_on_oom = 22;

params.name: var
params.description: If true, save a heap dump before killing a thread or process which is GC thrashing or out of memory. The location of the heap file will either be echoed back to the user, or the user will be given the opportunity to download the heap file.

methods.name: getSaveHeapDumpsToGcsPath
methods.description:
Cloud Storage bucket (directory) to upload heap dumps to the given location. Enabling this implies that heap dumps should be generated on OOM (dump_heap_on_oom is set to true).

Generated from protobuf field string save_heap_dumps_to_gcs_path = 23;

methods.name: setSaveHeapDumpsToGcsPath
methods.description:

Generated from protobuf field string save_heap_dumps_to_gcs_path = 23;

params.description: Cloud Storage bucket (directory) to upload heap dumps to the given location. Enabling this implies that heap dumps should be generated on OOM (dump_heap_on_oom is set to true).
